name: jogodaforca-monorepo
description: Jogo da Forca - Aplicação fullstack com AdonisJS, React e Socket.IO

scripts.build-shared: cd shared && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.prepare: npm run build-shared && npm run install-back && npm run install-front
scripts.install:all: npm run install-shared && npm run prepare
scripts.db:reset: docker-compose exec backend node ace migration:fresh --force --seed
scripts.db:migrate: docker-compose exec backend node ace migration:run
scripts.db:seed: docker-compose exec backend node ace db:seed
scripts.shell:db: docker-compose exec db psql -U root -d jogodaforca
